doc.title: No Secrets Get to Know Us: A Video Fanzine
doc.plot: A DVD/VHS release, a video fanzine with behind the scenes footage featuring the girl-group "No Secrets". Also, Includes the music video for "Kids in America", and four studio performances where the girls sing, "It's Alright", "On the Floor", "I Know What I Want", and "Here I Am". They also answer questions like What are their favorite foods?, Which two members of the group are related?, Who is the youngest member of the group?, and How did they come up with the group's name?
